Package de.aicard.domains.learnset

Class LearnSetAbo

java.lang.Object
de.aicard.domains.learnset.LearnSetAbo
public class LearnSetAbo
extends java.lang.Object
Provides a LearnSet with further, account-specific information and is thus always embedded into an account. The further information provided by the LearnSetAbo are an ArrayList of CardStatus to safe the state of learning of the user for all the Cards in the LearnSet, the state of the LearnSet, the LearnSet itself and the evaluation the Account has given the LearnSet.
Author:
Daniel Michel

  • Field Details

    • cardStatus

      private java.util.ArrayList<CardStatus> cardStatus
      The member-variable m_cardStatus is an ArrayList of CardStatus. It contains a CardStatus for each Card in the LearnSet m_learnSet.

    • learnSetStatus

      private State learnSetStatus
      The status of the LearnSet of the Account.

    • learnSet

      private LearnSet learnSet
      The LearnSet the Account subscribed to.

    • evaluation

      private int evaluation
      The evaluation the Account has given to the LearnSet. If the Account has not yet given an evaluation to the LearnSet, the variable m_evaluation has the value -1.

      public void setCardStatus​(java.util.ArrayList<CardStatus> _cardStatus)

    • set_evaluation

      public void set_evaluation​(int _evaluation)
      Sets the evaluation of the Account for the corresponding LearnSet. First checks, if there is already an evaluation of this account for this LearnSet. If so, this evaluation is deleted. Then, the member-variable m_evaluation is set to the value of the new evaluation, and the evaluation is added to the LearnSet.
      Parameters:
      _evaluation - Evaluation, the Account wants to give to the LearnSet.

    • delete_evaluation

      public void delete_evaluation()
      Deletes the evaluation of the Account for the corresponding LearnSet.

    • getCardStatusOfKnowledgeLevel

      private java.util.ArrayList<CardStatus> getCardStatusOfKnowledgeLevel​(CardKnowledgeLevel _level)
      Method to get all Cards of the LearnSet with a specific CardKnowledgeLevel. Checks the KnowLedgeLevel of all Cards in the List. Puts the CardStatus with the wanted level in a new ArrayList of CardStatus. Returns this List.
      Parameters:
      _level - The CardKnowledgeLevel we are looking for
      Returns:
      A List of all CardStatus in the LearnSetAbo with the CardKnowledgeLevel level

    • createCardStatusListForSession

      private java.util.ArrayList<CardStatus> createCardStatusListForSession​(int _numOfCards)
      Creates an ArrayList of CardStatus with a specific Number of Cards. Checks the CardStatus List of the Abo for one CardKnowledgeLevel after another (lowest level first) and fills a new ArrayList of CardStatus with the CardStatus of the lowest level, until there are as many CardStatus in the List as wanted.
      Parameters:
      _numOfCards - The number of CardStatus we want in the returned ArrayList.
      Returns:
      List of the size _numOfCards, consists of the CardStatus in the LearnSetAbo with the lowest CardKnowledgeLevel.

    • createLearningSession

      public LearningSession createLearningSession​(int _numOfCards)
      Creates a LearningSession with a specific number of Cards. First, it gets a List of the CardStatus in the LearnSetAbo of the lowest CardKnowledgeLevel. Then, it constructs a LearnSet of this CardStatus ArrayList.
      Parameters:
      _numOfCards - how many Cards should be asked for in the LearningSession
      Returns:
      The created LearningSession.
